= Installation AymaraMorph =
How to install the AymaraMorph.
  # Download AymaraMorph from http://www.dropbox.com/s/uq8d0sb2vlujazf/AymaraMorphAnalyzerRelease.tar.gz
  # Download and install XFST, for more details about XFST go to http://www.stanford.edu/~laurik/.book2software/ 
  # Compile AymaraMorph.
